KSP : 0.25

Problem : Crash after initial loading screen. (when the file loading screen goes away and the little loading icon pops up)

Mod installed :

BD Armory

Astronomer's visual pack

B9 aerospace

Chatterer

Docking port alignment

Hot Rockets

Infernal Robotic

Kerbal Alarm clock

KW rocketry

Mech Jeb

MKS 0.20.9 (sorry i forgot which mod this is)

Near future propulsion

OPT space Plane parts

Reproduction steps : Every time i launch the game it crashes, i tried X32 and X64, both crash after loading screen.

Log : its the x32 log, if anyone need the x64 version just pm me or somthin.

http://goo.gl/C0Z8zF

Edited December 6, 2014 by tetryds

Welcome to the forums!

You're running out of memory:

Trying to allocate: 22369624B with 32 alignment. MemoryLabel: Texture

Allocation happend at: Line:411 in

Memory overview

The How to Get Support sticky has more details and solutions for memory crashes.

HandleD3DDeviceLost

HandleD3DDeviceLost: still lost

Skipped frame because GfxDevice is in invalid state (device lost)

Hi DatZimbie, don't minimise KSP while it loads, use Alt+enter to go to window mode instead so you don't break it
